summary: Kaliningrad, formerly known as KÃ¶nigsberg, is a Russian city located on the Baltic Sea. It's the biggest city in the Kaliningrad Oblast, a part of Russia that's separated from the main country. The city was heavily damaged during World War II and was renamed and rebuilt by Russia in 1946. It was originally founded in 1255 by the Teutonic Knights. Today, Kaliningrad is an important transport hub and home to the Russian Navy's Baltic Fleet. It's also known for its industry and has won awards for being one of the best cities in Russia.
title: Kaliningrad
